description.narrative: The WaterHub Franschhoek is based on similar water focused hubs in the Netherlands and elsewhere. The water challenges in South Africa needs solutions beyond existing technology. The combined efforts (research, education, demonstration and entrepreneurship) as present at the waterhubs in the Netherlands are believed to be very helpful to stimulate innovations and market access of new methods and technologies in South Africa. Climate related water challenges can most likely not be solved with just methods, technologies and companies known and used in South Africa so far. On a former waste water treatment plan, a demonstration and training site (the Water Hub) will be developed. Technologies can be validated, tested, adjusted with support from students who will learn about the most recent technological developments. Apart from technology demonstration and piloting, focus will also be on business development and business acceleration models into the South African and African markets. The Water Hub will eventually have limited staff to facilitate its activities in the research, training and business accelerator areas of its business model. Students will assist on location and experienced consultants will be mandated for specific tasks following requests from companies present at the Water Hub. The Consulate General (CG) in Cape Town will support the Water Hub in the initial phase in the field of market introductions of Dutch water technology companies. Dutch companies can demonstrate their solutions and can be supported with introductions in the South African market. The Water Hub will:-deliver a strategy and practical roadmap in the form of “accelerator” services on supporting companies to the South African market.-prepare an extensive database of suitable consultants to offer the above services.- render the above services to the appointed Dutch businesses through the identified consultants and incorporate their feedback into improving the services on offer to the businesses.

participating-org.narrative: Consulaat-Generaal van het Koninkrijk der Nederlanden
Embassy of the Kingdom of the Netherlands South Africa

receiver-org.narrative: Embassy of the Kingdom of the Netherlands South Africa
Embassy of the Kingdom of the Netherlands South Africa
